main.name: Quang Anh (QA) Hoang
main.bio: I am a full-stack software engineer actively seeking SWE internships with an emphasis on distributed systems and parallel computing but open to any opportunities. I enjoy coding, building cool things and learning from teaching others. My interests include coding, chess, soccer, tennis, MMA, table tennis, billiards and many more.
main.funfact: I was the under-16 Chinese Chess (Xiangqi) and table tennis champion of my hometown, Hanoi. I am currently teaching myself Chess and Tennis with a goal of competing in tournaments in the near future! Challenge me to a game on lichess@superqa!
main.contactmessage: I am open to opportunities and/or collaborations! Shoot me a message!

description: Worked on Buck (https://buck.build), a distributed build system developed and used at Facebook.

work.title: Data Engineer
description: Wrote multithreaded code to pull data from APIs leveraging Java and knowledge of RESTful APIs & JSON.
Updated databases and maintained stock data integrity using Java (JDBC) and SQL.
Rewrote legacy Groovy code in Java leveraging best practices.
Fixed & improved the calculations of technical analysis indicators/datasets written in Java.

work.title: Senior Admission Intern
description: Read and evaluated applications for admission.
Scheduled and conducted interviews with 50+ prospective domestic & international students.

work.title: Research Assistant

languages: Proficient in Java; familiar with Python, JavaScript, C, C++, SQL, Postgres
technologies: Django, Jersey, Tomcat, Apache Kafka, Zookeeper, Docker, Heroku
AWS Aurora, DynamoDB, EC2, RDS, Elastic Load Balancer, ElastiCache and other AWS services
